text: Bellonne is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== A small village located 12 miles (19 km) east of Arras on the D44 road. ==Population== ==Sights== * The church of St. Martin, rebuilt in the 20th century, along with most of the village. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Bellonne
